textBeforeTable: Show Schedule This is very preliminary. We don't even have a construction license yet. Program schedule 5. Misc. Monad: I want to make a short program about using tools. Clif P: I'm a multi-instrumentalist and could do a DJ set of post-rock/doom and good electroacoustic music. Martin: Blues music show. 4.Music/Art/Poetry 3.Education 2.Public Affairs 1.News LinkReincarnate: 3 hour per week as a 1 hour program every other work day. Hacker news program covering Hacking, science, gaming, and technology news and opinion. == Person, Show description Declare if possible when you are able to broadcast. Our first step with finding content to fill the airwaves with will be to find people willing to use this transmitter as a means to express themselves. After that, building a program schedule will help to keep us from getting confused. Below you'll find the program schedule/ sign up sheet. News, Independent opinions, Short stories, Poetry, Music, Live performances. Content/Sign Up Sheet -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Low_power_radio_station http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_radio_topics Sutro tower: https://maps.google.com/maps?ui=maps&ie=UTF8&ll=37.755316,-122.452058&spn=0.001735,0.009817&t=h&deg=270&z=18&vpsrc=6 - http://www.fcc.gov/encyclopedia/low-power-fm-broadcast-radio-stations-lpfm Applications for new LPFM stations can only be filed on FCC Form 318 during the dates specified for an application filing window. Applications received at other times will be returned without consideration. We cannot provide advance
textAfterTable: Technology Matthieu: Helping martin trying to slap together a sdr (software defined radio) war driving system. more info here [1][2] [1] http://sdr.osmocom.org/trac/wiki/rtl-sdr [2] http://rtlsdr.org/softwarewindows Financial budget Location, equipment, facilities. Transmitter & Antenna location: On top of a hill, Sutro tower, or rall building? Benefit: Larger coverage area, more listeners. At Noisebridge facility: Benefit: Low cost. Disadvanages: Fewer listeners because smaller coverage are due to signal being blocked by local hills & buildings. Studio options: Turning the DJ booth into an actual real live DJ booth. Having the station out in the open to allow a for a more decentralized radio transmitter. Could cause problems if tampered with. It may be in our best interest to use the DJ booth. Action Items Meeting 9/17/2013 J.C., giovanni, Jarrod, Andrew, RAYC Reach 10 hackerspaces. - Giovanni & Jarrod?
